title: Intensive Short-Term Course Utilizing e-Portfolios for Advanced English Writing Proficiency Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or advanced English writing skills and familiarity with job-related technical terminology
context.additional_context: A non-degree corporate job enhancement program conducted in a constrained technological environment centered on smartphones, focusing on advanced writing assessment competencies applicable to practical tasks.

learning_goals: Learners can upload three advanced English writing samples to an e-portfolio platform and apply self-assessment rubrics
Learners can write goal-oriented comments on two peer writings using peer feedback functionality
Learners can submit their final work as an integrated portfolio and demonstrate at least 20% improvement in writing proficiency through pre-post comparisons

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
